MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH63 postcode area of Bebington, affecting properties in Town Lane, Malpas Drive and surrounding street. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.39am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:34am on the 28th January 2021.
